Key Match Events: Julius Randle had 16 points, 6 rebounds, 3 assists, and 2 steals, going +21 during his 35 minutes.
Randle played solid defense on New Orleans' Zion Williamson.
Post-Match Reflections: Timberwolves head coach Chris Finch was pleased with Julius Randle's performance in Minnesota's win over the Pelicans.
Finch noted that he has a lot of respect for how Randle has handled the different things the Wolves have asked him to do this season.
